website_summaries.verdict: For an oil with an easy-to-use consistency and light-but-pleasant scent, you can’t go wrong with this Brookethorne Naturals selection.
pros: Oil has pleasant scent with a hint of mint that makes it refreshing
Has a smooth consistency that’s easy to work into skin
1 pump goes a long way, making this 8.5-ounce bottle long-lasting
cons: Absorbs into skin faster than some would like during a massage

website_summaries.verdict: The perfect at-home calming oil to use when massaging yourself or a loved one.
pros: Doesn’t leave oily residue on the skin
Some say the oils instantly relieved pain and muscle spasms
cons: Some report that the pump eventually broke

customer_reviews.title: Threapeutic massage oil Smells like your laying in lavender fields
customer_reviews.text: This massage oil has a wonderful scent for every lavender lover. I was worried the peppermint might be too heavy in fragrance or have an overly STRONG natural cooling effect on my muscles, but overall the peppermint wasn't strong enough to leave a lasting impact on my muscles. I would have loved to have a tad more peppermint in the bottle for the natural impact it does have on our muscles but more than anything, I am happy the peppermint wasn't over-powering. Overall, I am happy with my purchase. I would recommend this massage oil because the ingredients are kind to the body and lastly who doesn't want to feel like they are laying in a field of lavender?!
customer_reviews.author: Ragan Mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect massage oil and fabulous scent!
customer_reviews.text: Due to a health issue, I have a massage once a month and am always on the look out for a massage oil that is effective and smells wonderful (after all... an our to oneself with a massage should be time well spent. This oil is perfect. The masseuse finds it pleasant / easy to work with as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caldrono

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Smells a little strong...
customer_reviews.text: The oil is very smooth and works great for massages. I enjoy the smell, however, if you have to reapply to your hands more than a few times it can become a little overbearing. Obviously that's a personal opinion but something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, but not "AH-MAZE-ING"
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what everyone was raving about in the reviews, it's just a basic massage oil. A bit heavy on the peppermint and marjoram side but not overwhelming. I've used my bottle for a year and a half now and it's just now starting to smell a little rancid, which is pretty good for a natural oil. I don't notice a whole lot of pain reduction from the oils themselves, just from a deep massage with it. I'm a lifetime scoliosis chronic pain surviver, so I know alot about what products provide relief! My go to product for ultimate pain relief will always be Absorbine veterinary linament gel, stinks but works without the massage!
customer_reviews.author: jwatts

customer_reviews.title: This amazing oil will help you relax and is smooth to ...
customer_reviews.text: Rub on your feet first to start relaxing... just make sure you already have the lights off, the oil makes your feet slippery. This amazing oil will help you relax and is smooth to apply. The pump is easy to use the bottle is clean enough to keep in any room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Lavender aroma
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product that I have bought that really smells of lavender. It is a nice relaxing balm. I use it to rub my shoulders and my collar bone. It is delightful
customer_reviews.author: Pollyanna

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. Smells awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Smells awesome, doesn't dry out quickly on the skin. The essential oils really help keep muscles relaxed after the massage is over, and the scent is just an overall calming formula. I will definitely be buying thi again once my first bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Foss

customer_reviews.title: Super lovely scent, serves its purpose well!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle came quickly, not damanged in the mail, smells DELIGHTFUL, and serves its purpose... The bottle is cute and packaged nice ... comes sealed and then you insert the pump nozzle, which I loved and really appreciated... I would buy again... however I believe I use too big of pumps per session of using because I powered through it .... would have liked to get more for what I paid.... but can’t complain because I may be an overuser..... Overall I like it a lot and think it’s lovely... would use again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Knight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent massage oil
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent massage oil. I've tried many products and this is absolutely perfect for a great Swedish massage.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Reid

customer_reviews.title: I am a Professional Massage Therapist who used this oil.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Professional massage therapist since August 2007. This oil is great if your doing long smooth strokes like Swedish massage, or if you just want to massage your partners shoulders. A little bit goes a long way with this oil. Consistent in slickness, not too oily. You will definitely need to wash hands after. Average massage oil, but not for professionals.
customer_reviews.author: rocky ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Pure relaxation
customer_reviews.text: Today, there are lots of essential oils to choose from and many different companies. Thank goodness for customer reviews which help guide my naivety. This lavender lotion is perfect. We have gone through a couple of them already and knew it was time to write a review. For the cost, couldn't be more pleased. The smell is delightful and we use it in the evening before bedtime. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well .
customer_reviews.text: I use this when my neck gets bad but also use another product also So this oil for like mild pain relieves it But not when it gets bad .so I alter it on this other massage oil that one helps more for more intense pain stiffness.along with a heating pad .but I do still use this one for less pain also like the cream in this brand better absorbs not so oily .wish all oils come in cream form with the same ingredients.but whatever works.I will continue use this .not strong smell .soothing.does some relaxing.overall will purchase again.take the other as well .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than described. bought this for my boyfriend who had just come back from a month-long training stint and the United States Army and he was sore all over. Gave him a full body massage and he said that this was the best massage oil is ever experienced and I have to agree. The scent is phenomenal and has a very relaxing quality to it. I'm not entirely sure what is in the oil itself but it does penetrate the muscles and cause them to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Parish

customer_reviews.title: Just a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wow I should of trusted the reviews and sent this back but went out of town and missed the window to return. Oily, smelly, non pain relief...just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: phototgguy

customer_reviews.title: Great for massage.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for deep tissue massage on clients, I need very little for a full 45 min massage, I literally just use 3-4 drops for full back massage so very impressed with it. Soaks into skin well, doesn’t leave a slippery residue on top. Gently scented, not overbearing. My clients love the scent. Would very happily recommend this to others. For an inexpensive oil I am very impressed as have used high end ones previously and none of them matched to the quality of this oil.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it - that's a big enough recommendation for me. Oil is pleasant for massages and the scent is there but not overwhelming. At first I thought the container was small and the oil wouldn't last long. But after 6 massages there's still 2/3 left in the bottle. Seems like a great product and a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mccague

customer_reviews.title: Smells great (maybe a little strong for some people)
customer_reviews.text: Smells great (maybe a little strong for some people). Works great for hands or this little plastic renpho deep tissue massager I got. It does soak into skin eventually, but, you know, it's oil not lotion. If you do want to wash it off you kinda gotta mean it. It's a lil hard to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz-ing Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband is a fan!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing all around! It smells wonderful and a little goes a long way. Just gave my husband a massage and the last thing he said to me was " This does make you relaxed! WOW!".... 3 minutes later he was snoring lol. Very smooth. Not sticky and absorbs well. My husband isn't a fan of oils and lotions but he sure is a fan of this stuff. I highly recommend! Awesome oil!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: great massage oil
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me as part of my Valentine gift. The smell of lavender and peppermint is very relaxing and invigorating. This is a great massage oil and helps relieve muscle tension and body aches. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: L & R

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Scent is very strong personal I love it After applying it to my clients it lingers after I’m done with the session. I use it as well for minor pains and I read somewhere that lavender is good to reduce swelling from bee stings my nephew got stung and his hand swelled up and he was in so much pain The next day I could not believe the difference it made.
customer_reviews.author: Mesmeric

customer_reviews.title: This oil is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in esthetician school and I use it in my facials. Non-comedogenic for the face and my clients and fellow students love it. The scents are wonderful and it doesn’t leave a greasy feeling. I dropped my bottle and broke off my pump. I emailed Meghan at Brookthorne Naturals and she offered to send me some replacement pumps free of charge! Now, that’s customer service. They have a lifetime customer in me now :)
customer_reviews.author: Jyl Nicole

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: It makes giving massages so much easier. It helps soothe muscles and pain without as much effort put forward. I would highly suggest for pain. It also leaves you feeling soothed for hours after the massage and is not super oily or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: **RiNat**

customer_reviews.title: Massage oils review.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to just beagle to give my wofe some massages. Immediately when it arrived, she smelt the lavender one first. All she said was "OMG this smells sooo good". Then she smelt the Mint and ucaliptus, again, "dam this smells good". I put a little on my hand to test for its feel. Very happy with it. I plan on buying this product again. The price is great for the amount I feel. Came quickly and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E.

customer_reviews.title: Scent a little strong but works great for massages
customer_reviews.text: The scent is nice it is just a little strong for my husband. But it does apply very well and last very long I am going to try the unscented one
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for massaging sore or tired muscles
customer_reviews.text: I use the oil for sore muscles and tired feet. It works so great. The scent is soft and does not linger. I use one pump per leg, 2-3 pumps for back depending on how long I’m massaging. It doesn’t stay oily, it blends in easily.
customer_reviews.author: sara castellon

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The scent is calming once you get used to smell it, at first I thought it smelled too strong. It glides smoothly on your skin and it doesn't feel sticky. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rika

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Soothes away the aches & pains. A nice faint scent, not greasy. A little goes a long way!! Very satisfied!! Purchased two of them one for me & my Sister, she also loves this product!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife loved this product I’m on my third bottle already, it has a mild scent and does not feel greasy and heals my sensitive and itchy skin👍
customer_reviews.author: Victor Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff I use it was a night lotion for me and my 2&6yr old. We all have sensitive skin and this does not let us break outin rashes. It relaxing really! i put a little bit on my kids' spine at bedtime and they are less hyper and more relax. I even think it allows them to sleep faster too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Massage Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the massage oil I purchased. It works great and isn't too thick like some oils. I also love the lavender and peppermint smell - relaxing and not overpowering at all. Will definitely order more once I use this first bottle. Highly recommend for home massages!
customer_reviews.author: Mandie Staley

customer_reviews.title: It’s important to know where your essential oils are coming from !
customer_reviews.text: The product presentation is clean and elegant. The overall texture of the oil is good and the scent is nice but I haven’t experienced any therapeutical benefits from using this product. I’m curious as to what brand of essential oils are being used in this blend?
customer_reviews.author: Dani R.

customer_reviews.title: Smells and performs well!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty picky about lavender scents; I really prefer them to smell like the actual plant! I was pleasantly surprised with this! This oil also has a nice consistency for massages. Makes the skin ‘slippery’ enough for your hands to glide, but not so slippery that you can’t move slowly and controlled across a tense muscle!
customer_reviews.author: JBO

customer_reviews.title: Instant pain relief in sleep
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product keep it on hand always helped me sleep. I have a pinched sciatic nerve on the left side of my lower back I have bone spurs and degenerative disc's in my neck it is a must to have always if I don't have this I don't sleep
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Go with the lavender!
customer_reviews.text: There's all kinds of massage oils out there but the scent of the lavender is not only peaceful but I think it even help relax mentally since it smells so amazing. Not too strong but just right, and not too oily either. It absorbs into the skin as a moisturizer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and them!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and even better seller! We will go out of our way to do business with them again and again and again.....
customer_reviews.author: Jason Losey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This massage oil is great and smells wonderful, my wife loves it! On top of that a whole hour and a half massage and barely put a dent in the bottle, so get a lot and lasts a
customer_reviews.author: Zach Vieweg

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good and affordable. Good addition to our massage oil box.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Nice massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Good massage oil. It is oil, and not lotion so it has that consistency but it absorbs into the skin and does not make a mess on fabrics. The scent is natural smelling, reminds me of essential oil lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Eagle

customer_reviews.title: I’m in heaven
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it last night and it came today. I couldn’t wait to try it and it made my hands feel so much better. I’m definitely buy more of this
customer_reviews.author: Tina Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent massage oil!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love product arrived sooner than expected it is perfect will definitely be buying again from seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Upgrades massages
customer_reviews.text: This is the first oil I bought for massage purposes only. It’s a huge upgrade from lotion. It was very silky smooth and the scent helped relax her to the max.
customer_reviews.author: WhiskeySix

customer_reviews.title: I love this massage oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massage oil! I have plantar fasciitis and this stuff feels so soothing on my tired sore feet. I can’t say enough about this wonderful oil. It’s totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kym/Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Scent leans to the minty side. Found the lavender was a bit weak. Higher concentrated lavendars provide more relaxing and soothing relief. I found the consistency a bit runny and oily. Liked the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Archie Saiz

customer_reviews.title: Massage Oil perfect with Mighty Bliss Massager
customer_reviews.text: I use with my Mighty Bliss massager. Gives the most relaxing feel ever. Love both the oil and Mighty Bliss. Will probably keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: JWaites

customer_reviews.title: Leaking from day 1
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to send it back but from the time I opened it to pop on the pump dispenser, the bottle won't stop leaking. Too bad, nice smell and consistency.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I have had better
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a strong smell and doesn't really do much for pain in my back . I have bought another oil off here and it worked great and has a better scent . Overall its decent but wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massage oil
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more if a reaction for this stuff but seems more like just an oil to massage no tingly feeling or cold sensation like I expected. But it does smell good!
customer_reviews.author: Amh

customer_reviews.title: Aroma massage therapy oil
customer_reviews.text: Feel relaxing and comfortable to use this oil.thank you Seller
customer_reviews.author: MARY KIM

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is great! The only issue is that it is not filled with oil all the way. The bottle was 3/4 full. Other than that, the smell and texture of the oil is great.
customer_reviews.author: Samirah Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Grate
customer_reviews.text: Very good works good smells nice a little oily but very good
customer_reviews.author: PENNY PACKER

customer_reviews.title: love the smell
customer_reviews.text: This massage oil smells amazing, feels like professional grade oil and does not leave your bed sheets with stains on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling Oil
customer_reviews.text: This lavendar oil is great smelling and very smooth. It is easy to use and spread on the skin. The scent is very relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really help swelling. But smells great and feels great on my ankle and foot. Had plantar fascia release surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this before. I have arthritis in my back and hands. I use this before I go to bed and then again when I get up. It works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: Useless and doesn’t help with pain AT ALL.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not what I expected, I was expecting something that would relieve my back pain and neck pain and at this absolutely did nothing, it was as though I was just slathering olive oil on my back and my neck. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jenghazi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smell.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice smell. Use it with a hand massager for my muscle spasms due to my multiple sclerosis...
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Geuy

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat this Value
customer_reviews.text: The smell is fantastic and it hand warms quickly . A little goes a long way . Leaves the skin feeling soft and not greasy .
customer_reviews.author: RAZZ

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs Up!!! It immediately put my husband to sleep so he enjoyed it and the smell was light ( not over powering)
customer_reviews.author: Ann Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy, great scent! The best massage oil I’ve ever used! I can’t tell you how nice it is to finally find an excellent massage oil!
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the smell! Reminds me of Glen ain’t Hot Sprigs and I cannot stop talking about it. Excellent product and you don’t need much to make it go far. Definitely will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not made for romantic nights
customer_reviews.text: Works really good he feels relaxed after his massage he has lower back issues so this really helps he falls asleep right away
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Newly pregnant, very sick (all day sickness) and major sleeping issues! This helps calm you body And even my nausea.. before bed rub it on my feet and put socks on. Along with a massage. I’m out like a rock after that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect oil for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this all over after I shower. Not too greasy and the aroma is not too pungent. It’s just perfect and absorbs quickly- will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: morethannurseshoes

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was fine. Came in a box with the pump top in plastic and the bottle closed with a cap. Used it to relax muscles on back with a massage and was told it was way better than any lotion. Only had to use a small amount and it lasted through the entire massage. Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and I love the oil - easy to use and lasts a long time during a massage
customer_reviews.author: Kalynn

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The Massage Oil smells great and stays on top of the skin nicely, allowing for a pleasant massage experience.

customer_reviews.title: Awwwwwww!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely scent, lovely oil, lovely in every way! I only use this product for massage oil.

customer_reviews.title: Therapeutic
customer_reviews.text: When appropriate, exceptionally relaxing. Pump works well. The peppermint warms nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Me and my wife loved it
customer_reviews.text: It really good oil the smell is very light and it does great job ,it makes massages easier and far better than our old one

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, smells good, helps with pain , helped me sleep i think it is the smell very calming.

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really into massage oils, but this stuff right here is the truth. I got to rubbing my lady with this stuff and she felt like she was in Paradise. I love the peppermint vapor smell it gives off. It really open you up.

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent, little pain control
customer_reviews.text: This did not have much pain relief for me. I somewhat liked the scent and it felt good to use with massage. I wish it helped pain more
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gazley

customer_reviews.title: great product, Brookethorne is very thorough with follow ups ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, Brookethorne is very thorough with follow ups and want to make sure product is delivered on time. Product is very soothing and there is not an oily residue after use. I highly recommend this product!!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great without any harsh odors or chemicals. I love all natural products and highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This product is not oily like other massage oils. The lavender scent is also not overpowering. I recommend!

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and it's not greasy not slimy, it leaves you skin soft with a nice aroma

I had an empty bottle I put it in but I really liked the bottle it came in. Other than that the product works amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Definitely try!

Definitely recommend this product to anyone with similar problem. Regards

customer_reviews.title: great product

customer_reviews.text: Thank you for reaching out to your customers. customer_reviews.title: massage oil
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I needed, it arrived promptly, so I was able to take it with me on a small trip to see a friend, the oil when massaged in released all the tensions. The fragrance was very subtle & not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Berta

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for my right shoulder. It works very quickly and helps with stiffness and it also soothes my sore muscles. The scent is very subtle and pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: LP Carter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I am shook it is very good, has a nice pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Love & Unity

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent, I was a little worried about it being too overpowering, but it was pleasant surprise. Peppermint and lavender go well together I learned. The oil isn’t super thick and not watery either. Definitely quality product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: We love this as a massage oil. It smells great and soaks in nicely so you're not left greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa

product_meta.title: Relax Therapeutic Body Massage Oil - with Best Essential Oils for Sore Muscles & Stiffness – Lavender, Peppermint & Marjoram - All Natural - with Sweet Almond, Grapeseed & Jojoba Oil 8.5oz
feature_bullets: BEST MASSAGE OIL FOR THERAPEUTIC MASSAGE - sweet almond massage oil enriched with Lavender, Marjoram & Peppermint Essential Oils for sore muscle relief, relaxation & stress relief. Great for body massage, sports or athletic massage, relaxing massage and more.
NEED TO UNWIND AFTER A LONG DAY? LOOKING FOR THE PERFECT WAY TO RELAX? Relax Therapeutic Massage Oil will help you to do just that!
THIS LAVENDER MASSAGE OIL is perfect for massage therapy as well as causal at home massages & back rubs – Best relaxing massage oil.
MADE FROM THE FINEST ALL NATURAL ingredients - Sweet Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil & Jojoba Oil are perfectly blended together to create this massage oil.
ALL NATURAL - MADE IN THE USA - PARABEN FREE - NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS - 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED
